SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: The user information will be returned in a flat object and include a return_to parameter where the user's browser should be redirected to finish the logout process.

PARAMETERS.NAME: return_to
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: To append your own return_to parameter to the value being sent here so that users are redirected to your own portal after logout

DESCRIPTION: Logout an aXcelerate User. The parameters below refer only to POST requests.
